data.actual_result: The bottom message reads "To install Discord, drag the icon to your Apllications folder"
data.expected_result: The bottom message reads "To install Discord, drag the icon to your Applications folder"
data.short_description: After opening the DiscordCanary.dmg file (OS X 10.9.5) "Applications" is spelled "Apllications" in the message explaining how to install at the bottom.
data.steps_to_repro: - Download Discord Canary - Open the DiscordCanary.dmg file
